text: Manppally is a small village in Kollam district, Kerala, India. It is located near Thazhava. == Politics == Manappally is a part of Karunagappally assembly constituency in Alappuzha (Lok Sabha constituency). Shri. R. Ramachandran is the current MLA of Karunagappally. Shri. K. C. Venugopal is the current member of parliament of Alappuzha. == Worship centres == There are some worship centres in Manappally. St. Mary's Salem Orthodox Church is an example for it. == References == Category:Villages in Kollam district
title: Manappally
